name: Journey to Antarctica
description:
Journey to Antarctica is a puzzle-platform game where you have to complete levels before Floe, our tiny ice cube, melts! 

Floe's size is given by how many ice cubes he is carrying around. The more he has, the larger and heavier he will be.  

Speed yourself up on wet floors and shoot tiny ice cubes to reach the end of the level before the time expires.

Controls:
  • A / Left Arrow -> Move left
  • D / Right Arrow -> Move right
  • Space / W / Upper Arrow -> Jump (Hold for higher jumps)
  • L / X / Shift -> Shoot (Hold to charge)
HUD:

The number inside the blue circle displays how many projectiles Floe is carrying. The connected bar shows his size progression. When the bar gets below or above the white spaces, Floe's size is reduced or increased accordingly.

The yellow bar indicates the charge that Floe is giving to the projectile: in the first half the charge power is low, in the second half it's medium and when its all filled up he's going to fire at maximum power.
